START: ^“Sir. There are three boat builders that came to me that are coincidentally brothers who all want to help remake the boats, what should we do?”
CHOICES: ^Add sails to the boats (If player has 25 Silk).
Small: ^“Sir, the smaller boats gave us more materials to work with but I do think our fishing abilities have been limited.”
Sails: ^“Sir, the boats that have sails seem to be working much better since we save more time traveing through the river.”
Large: ^“Sir, the larger boats have taken up a lot of materials but we’ve been able to collect much more fish at a time because of it.”
